title: DSE Bio Tissue Fluid 問題

replies.msg:
點解答案係D?
因為Liver Cell carry out respiration?
推

Equilibrium 問題

3. 錯。
因為
1. Fastened
2. Site X(at a particular location)
3. 即使along blood capillaries, 依然lower blood glucose level

4. Correct
1. Since there is a continuous blood flow, the equilibrium established in between [CO2] in tissue fluid and [CO2] in blood capillaries down concentration gradient can't never be reached. Therefore, lower CO2 in blood capillaries

你嘗試下將phy Chem concept 套埋落bio一齊溫

嘗試將bio思考套落chem phy一齊諗

你會有意想不到既效果

等我嘗試解釋 求高人指出錯處 ：
A. 錯
Fasting
-> no food to liver
-> no breakdown of protein
-> no urea formed
-> same urea con.
B. 錯
white blood cell is present in Tissue fluid
C. 錯
Fasting
-> no food to liver
-> no glucose
-> same glucose content
唔明：
liver唔係會convert glucagon to glucose
咁glucose 咪點都會more in blood capillary?
D. 岩
Liver cells respire continuously
-> Co2 always higher in tissue fluid

睇箭嘴啦ching

你紅字個度好似好有道理，但正正d人讀唔通material exchange ge misconception

你諗諗(我當真係勁多glucose is transported from specific liver cells into capillaries)
1. Site X location
-> hydrostatic pressure > oncotic pressure
-> net filtration （箭嘴）

2. Continuous blood flow

你思考下1 2關係同你紅字個句，你就會明我點解解釋3時話, along blood capillaries, always lower blood glucose level

再講，現實上，佢唔係一次過爆曬glucose出黎；而係慢慢"jit"出黎，according to homeostatic equilibrium

點解係D?
part 5 photosynthesis嘅food 唔係develop 新嘅storage organ 咩？
development of bud 應該靠本身storage organ提供嘅food架

part 5 photosynthesis嘅food 唔係develop 新嘅storage organ 咩？

PRODUCE FOOD

我用中文讀bio但都想討論下
條題目應該係問你：咩部位製造食物比3去生長
植物製造食物日間主要靠光合作用
水+二氧變氧+葡萄糖+能量
植物既「食物」係葡萄糖/澱粉質，只不過係單糖同多糖
而因為光合作用多數係葉面進行，所以答案係部位5
有錯請指教

發覺樓主唔適合讀理科，一黎睇題目太大意，product, produce 都睇錯，二黎最緊要既箭咀都睇錯，三黎，logic 太弱 好多問題唔係書直接比你，而要你自己諗諗，co2 果題就見到logic

屌真係比D用字玩撚死
35題 formation of gamete 我以為唔直接lead to variation in offspring
點知原來都係
